      • addDate

        public static Date addDate(Date date,
                           int amount,
                           int timeUnit)
        Adds a specified amount of time to a date based on the given time unit.
        Parameters:
        date - the original date
        amount - the amount of time to add
        timeUnit - the calendar field (e.g., Calendar.MILLISECOND, Calendar.SECOND, Calendar.MINUTE, Calendar.HOUR, Calendar.DAY_OF_YEAR, Calendar.MONTH, Calendar.YEAR)
        Returns:
        the new Date object with the added time
